Content: crashed almost immediately and lost my entered data
Pretty straightforward and easy to use! It does seem to crash when I'm adding a personal background from camera roll but I rarely do that so it doesn't bother me. I've used this app for years.
Doesnt work from the get go. Cant add a title to an event (keeps kicking me out) and the app continuously crashes.
It's fine but sometimes it freezes and I have to start the app again

Would be OK if it wasn't for the ads which pop up with loud music all the time! Probably is good but I can cope with pop up ads while I'm using it but when my phone suddenly starts playing awful music from a pop up ad every few minutes it means it's unusable for me. Did try to upgrade in the hope of getting rid of the ads but people on there said it crashes when they do that
Just writing 5 stars for extra events. Crashes loads tho
It gets stuck Trying to type out the title, the app freezes. Also when you dave it forces a google play store app to randomly oop up
Works well and I like the stock images. Not as widget friendly as dream days, but it also doesn't crash on my S8.
Crashes my Pixel. Plus, why does it need permission to access my photos? Should be required WHEN I decide to use one.
Disaster. I've been unable to select a picture from my gallery without the app crashing. Not once.
Made my phone freeze. Upon trying to use this app for the first time it made my phone run slow and then made my phone restart.
Keeps crashing when I try to add an event. When I place the cursor in the title field, it closes my keyboard. Uninstalling to find something that actually works.
Anytime I try to open the app it freezes until I back out manually close all apps then reopen it.
It sucks. It kept crashing and it didnt work afyer 2 miniutes of using it
Kept on trying to add event on the app kept on crashing and closing down
The app kept crashing after I'd just installed it.
Keeps crashing when I go to pick a background image. Pointless
I like the ease of use and the backgrounds, however it crashes a lot and only allows a few countdowns at a time.
DO NOT USE. KEEPS ON CRASHING
Tried to upload a picture and it crashes every time
Doesn't work. Freezes and shuts down
Glitchy and crashed but I love the idea
app crashed every time I tried to choose my own photo from my gallery.
It was very good and it didn't crash out once it has a range of pics and its very cool😊❤
Crashes all the time. Oreo.
Keeps crashing but ok
The app keeps crashing
Love it but keeps crashing!
Cant even set my date before it crashes
Continually crashes
Awesome Very easy to use!!!! Never crashes
Keeps freezing I can rarely get it to open because it freezes on a black screen. I have to force close it a few times to get it to work.
Crashes too much! Hit or miss if it will work! Constant black screen
This is a great app but sometimes when I try to change the pictures it either crashes or doesn't load then crashes
Like it but Crashes

I do not recommend installing this. Possible dangerous app. Needs access to ALL your information. Norhing appears to work and freezes all the time. Norton virus checker also doesn't like this app. My uploaded data count increased when I have nothing running.
Uninstalled within 30 seconds. Too many ads. Very crashy. Big no!
Super slow, thought at one point it caused my phone to freeze because the screen went black and I couldn't do anything. No options to change the text color. And way too many ads for a countdown app.
I installed it and it immediately crashed. The only thing that worked were the many ad's :-( will look for something else
Too many adds- and not just when you're using the app. They pop up all of the time. The app itself is glitchy and freezes, so not worth the effort of the annoying adds.
Constantly freezes, way too many ads that pop up while typing so you click on them, and it vibrates your device constantly.
Total crap The (cr)app crashed every single time that I tried to enter an event. Obviously I uninstalled.
Not a good app This app is way to buggy. Crashed on me multiple times after instalation. Got rid of it right after that.
Really slow, crashed ever time tried to add photos yet worked fine to play all the adverts, god knows how this got a good rating!
The app crashed often and used a lot of battery. Also not a fan of the ads
It kept crashing every time I tried to enter a countdown. 😒
App keeps crashing each time I try to add an image.
Don't install this app. It crashes every single time
Bugging And crashing and not responding A LOT
Kept crashing. Couldn't even use once
It freezes up and doesn't even work
Its crashing when im chosing a custom image
Crashed the first time I opened it.
Rubbish Kept crashing my phone.
Kept crashing. Totally useless
crashing everytime I open it.
Opened app instantly crashed
App kept crashing !
crashed my phone
Can't do anything because it crashes as soon as you open it
Does not save settings, freezes phone.
